Text: Many Thanks for your "Baby" its very special acoustic Music :)

Hey djsforfun, what's up with this release group SOM? It looks like a normal scene release group (well, the naming scheme does), but they use so many different encoding settings (128k, 256k, using "--alt-preset-standard" aka "-V2", while the standard has been "-V2 --vbr-new" for quite a while -  or just -V2, using lame3.98).
They (and you) do release some quality bands, though, big thumbs up for that! (Except the 128k releases  ;p)
